message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product at a competitive price of $15,000. I believe it will bring you a lot of value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $13,000 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.
